summary: This is an email from July 20, 2020, regarding an inquiry from the New Mexico U.S. Attorney's Office about the possible forfeiture of Jeffrey Epstein's property in New Mexico. The sender is requesting a call with the recipients to discuss the matter.

events.title: Inquiry about Epstein property forfeiture
events.description: The New Mexico U.S. Attorney's Office makes an inquiry about the possible forfeiture of Jeffrey Epstein's New Mexico property.

keyFacts: The New Mexico U.S. Attorney's Office inquired about forfeiting Jeffrey Epstein's property in New Mexico.
The inquiry was made via email on July 20, 2020.
The email requests a call to discuss the forfeiture matter.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings regarding Epstein's assets after his death.
